name: Odd-Eyes Lancer Dragon
desc: If a Pendulum Monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect, while this card is in your hand: You can Tribute 1 monster; Special Summon this card. If this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate any Spell/Traps until the end of the Damage Step. If an "Odd-Eyes" card(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can destroy 1 "Odd-Eyes" card in your hand, Monster Zone, or Pendulum Zone instead.
